title: Video: Neon Indian – Polish Girl
body:
If you can cast your minds back to the 6th of September, you’ll remember that **CITR**’s Chris Heasman was a pretty big fan of the new **[Neon Indian](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/10967-review-neon-indian-era-extrana/ "Review: Neon Indian – Era Extraña")** record, **_Era Extraña_**. Today Neon Indian dropped the official video for the album cut ‘Polish Girl’. Directed by **[Tim Nackashi](http://timnackashi.com/)** and made in conjunction with **[The Creators Project](http://www.thecreatorsproject.com/)**, the video tells the inter-entity love affair of a robot and the woman he loves. It’s actually bizarrely moving, and through its art style perfectly captures the throwback style of the record.

Stream the new video below.
